phrase: "And every time I have called to them, that Thou mightest forgive them, they have (only) thrust their fingers into their ears, covered themselves up with their garments, grown obstinate, and given themselves up to arrogance.
translation: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوا أَصَابِعَهُمْ فِي آذَانِهِمْ وَاسْتَغْشَوْا ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا وَاسْتَكْبَرُوا اسْتِكْبَارًا

phrase: "So I have called to them aloud;
translation: ثُمَّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا

phrase: "Further I have spoken to them in public and secretly in private,
translation: ثُمَّ إِنِّي أَعْلَنْتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا

phrase: "Saying, ´Ask forgiveness from your Lord; for He is Oft-Forgiving;
translation: فَقُلْتُ اسْتَغْفِرُوا رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُ كَانَ غَفَّارًا

phrase: "´He will send rain to you in abundance;
translation: يُرْسِلِ السَّمَاءَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِدْرَارًا

phrase: "´Give you increase in wealth and sons; and bestow on you gardens and bestow on you rivers (of flowing water).
translation: وَيُمْدِدْكُمْ بِأَمْوَالٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَلْ لَكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ وَيَجْعَلْ لَكُمْ أَنْهَارًا

phrase: "´What is the matter with you, that ye place not your hope for kindness and long-suffering in Allah,-
translation: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا

phrase: "´Seeing that it is He that has created you in diverse stages?
translation: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا

phrase: "´See ye not how Allah has created the seven heavens one above another,
translation: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا كَيْفَ خَلَقَ اللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ طِبَاقًا

phrase: "´And made the moon a light in their midst, and made the sun as a (Glorious) Lamp?
translation: وَجَعَلَ الْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ الشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا

phrase: "´And Allah has produced you from the earth growing (gradually),
translation: وَاللَّهُ أَنْبَتَكُمْ مِنَ الْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا

phrase: "´And in the End He will return you into the (earth), and raise you forth (again at the Resurrection)?
translation: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا

phrase: "´And Allah has made the earth for you as a carpet (spread out),
translation: وَاللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا

phrase: "´That ye may go about therein, in spacious roads.´"
translation: لِتَسْلُكُوا مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا

phrase: Noah said: "O my Lord! They have disobeyed me, but they follow (men) whose wealth and children give them no increase but only Loss.
translation: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِي وَاتَّبَعُوا مَنْ لَمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُ وَوَلَدُهُ إِلَّا خَسَارًا

phrase: "And they have devised a tremendous Plot.
translation: وَمَكَرُوا مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا

phrase: "And they have said (to each other), ´Abandon not your gods: Abandon neither Wadd nor Suwa´, neither Yaguth nor Ya´uq, nor Nasr´;-
translation: وَقَالُوا لَا تَذَرُنَّ آلِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا

phrase: "They have already misled many; and grant Thou no increase to the wrong-doers but in straying (from their mark)."
translation: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَالًا

phrase: Because of their sins they were drowned (in the flood), and were made to enter the Fire (of Punishment): and they found- in lieu of Allah- none to help them.
translation: مِمَّا خَطِيئَاتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا فَأُدْخِلُوا نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا لَهُمْ مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ أَنْصَارًا

phrase: And Noah, said: "O my Lord! Leave not of the Unbelievers, a single one on earth!
translation: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ دَيَّارًا

phrase: "For, if Thou dost leave (any of) them, they will but mislead Thy devotees, and they will breed none but wicked ungrateful ones.
translation: إِنَّكَ إِنْ تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوا إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا

phrase: "O my Lord! Forgive me, my parents, all who enter my house in Faith, and (all) believing men and believing women: and to the wrong-doers grant Thou no increase but in perdition!"
translation: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِمَنْ دَخَلَ بَيْتِيَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًا

phrase: Say: It has been revealed to me that a company of Jinns listened (to the Qur´an). They said, ´We have really heard a wonderful Recital!
translation: قُلْ أُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ أَنَّهُ اسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِنَ الْجِنِّ فَقَالُوا إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْآنًا عَجَبًا

phrase: ´It gives guidance to the Right, and we have believed therein: we shall not join (in worship) any (gods) with our Lord.
translation: يَهْدِي إِلَى الرُّشْدِ فَآمَنَّا بِهِ ۖ وَلَنْ نُشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَا أَحَدًا

phrase: ´And Exalted is the Majesty of our Lord: He has taken neither a wife nor a son.
translation: وَأَنَّهُ تَعَالَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا اتَّخَذَ صَاحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا

phrase: ´There were some foolish ones among us, who used to utter extravagant lies against Allah;
translation: وَأَنَّهُ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى اللَّهِ شَطَطًا

phrase: ´But we do think that no man or spirit should say aught that untrue against Allah.
translation: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّا أَنْ لَنْ تَقُولَ الْإِنْسُ وَالْجِنُّ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا

phrase: ´True, there were persons among mankind who took shelter with persons among the Jinns, but they increased them in folly.
translation: وَأَنَّهُ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِنَ الْإِنْسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِنَ الْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا

phrase: ´And they (came to) think as ye thought, that Allah would not raise up any one (to Judgment).
translation: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا كَمَا ظَنَنْتُمْ أَنْ لَنْ يَبْعَثَ اللَّهُ أَحَدًا

phrase: ´And we pried into the secrets of heaven; but we found it filled with stern guards and flaming fires.
translation: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا السَّمَاءَ فَوَجَدْنَاهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا

phrase: ´We used, indeed, to sit there in (hidden) stations, to (steal) a hearing; but any who listen now will find a flaming fire watching him in ambush.
translation: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَاعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَنْ يَسْتَمِعِ الْآنَ يَجِدْ لَهُ شِهَابًا رَصَدًا

phrase: ´And we understand not whether ill is intended to those on earth, or whether their Lord (really) intends to guide them to right conduct.
translation: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِي أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَنْ فِي الْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا

phrase: ´There are among us some that are righteous, and some the contrary: we follow divergent paths.
translation: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الصَّالِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَائِقَ قِدَدًا

phrase: ´But we think that we can by no means frustrate Allah throughout the earth, nor can we frustrate Him by flight.
translation: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّا أَنْ لَنْ نُعْجِزَ اللَّهَ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَنْ نُعْجِزَهُ هَرَبًا

phrase: ´And as for us, since we have listened to the Guidance, we have accepted it: and any who believes in his Lord has no fear, either of a short (account) or of any injustice.
translation: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا الْهُدَىٰ آمَنَّا بِهِ ۖ فَمَنْ يُؤْمِنْ بِرَبِّهِ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا

phrase: ´Amongst us are some that submit their wills (to Allah), and some that swerve from justice. Now those who submit their wills - they have sought out (the path) of right conduct:
translation: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُولَٰئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا رَشَدًا

phrase: ´But those who swerve,- they are (but) fuel for Hell-fire´-
translation: وَأَمَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا

phrase: (And Allah´s Message is): "If they (the Pagans) had (only) remained on the (right) Way, We should certainly have bestowed on them Rain in abundance.
translation: وَأَنْ لَوِ اسْتَقَامُوا عَلَى الطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَاهُمْ مَاءً غَدَقًا

phrase: "That We might try them by that (means). But if any turns away from the remembrance of his Lord, He will cause him to undergo a severe Penalty.
translation: لِنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَنْ يُعْرِضْ عَنْ ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا

phrase: "And the places of worship are for Allah (alone): So invoke not any one along with Allah;
translation: وَأَنَّ الْمَسَاجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا مَعَ اللَّهِ أَحَدًا

phrase: "Yet when the Devotee of Allah stands forth to invoke Him, they just make round him a dense crowd."
translation: وَأَنَّهُ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ اللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا

phrase: Say: "I do no more than invoke my Lord, and I join not with Him any (false god)."
translation: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَدْعُو رَبِّي وَلَا أُشْرِكُ بِهِ أَحَدًا

phrase: Say: "It is not in my power to cause you harm, or to bring you to right conduct."
translation: قُلْ إِنِّي لَا أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا

phrase: Say: "No one can deliver me from Allah (If I were to disobey Him), nor should I find refuge except in Him,
translation: قُلْ إِنِّي لَنْ يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ اللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِنْ دُونِهِ مُلْتَحَدًا

phrase: "Unless I proclaim what I receive from Allah and His Messages: for any that disobey Allah and His Messenger,- for them is Hell: they shall dwell therein for ever."
translation: إِلَّا بَلَاغًا مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرِسَالَاتِهِ ۚ وَمَنْ يَعْصِ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ فَإِنَّ لَهُ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا

phrase: At length, when they see (with their own eyes) that which they are promised,- then will they know who it is that is weakest in (his) helper and least important in point of numbers.
translation: حَتَّىٰ إِذَا رَأَوْا مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا

phrase: Say: "I know not whether the (Punishment) which ye are promised is near, or whether my Lord will appoint for it a distant term.
translation: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِي أَقَرِيبٌ مَا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُ رَبِّي أَمَدًا

phrase: "He (alone) knows the Unseen, nor does He make any one acquainted with His Mysteries,-
translation: عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِ أَحَدًا

phrase: "Except a messenger whom He has chosen: and then He makes a band of watchers march before him and behind him,
translation: إِلَّا مَنِ ارْتَضَىٰ مِنْ رَسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُ يَسْلُكُ مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِ رَصَدًا

phrase: "That He may know that they have (truly) brought and delivered the Messages of their Lord: and He surrounds (all the mysteries) that are with them, and takes account of every single thing."
translation: لِيَعْلَمَ أَنْ قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا رِسَالَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ عَدَدًا

phrase: O thou folded in garments!
translation: يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُزَّمِّلُ

phrase: Stand (to prayer) by night, but not all night,-
translation: قُمِ اللَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا

phrase: Half of it,- or a little less,
translation: نِصْفَهُ أَوِ انْقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا

phrase: Or a little more; and recite the Qur´an in slow, measured rhythmic tones.
translation: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ الْقُرْآنَ تَرْتِيلًا

phrase: Soon shall We send down to thee a weighty Message.
translation: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِي عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًا ثَقِيلًا

phrase: Truly the rising by night is most potent for governing (the soul), and most suitable for (framing) the Word (of Prayer and Praise).
translation: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ اللَّيْلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطْئًا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا

phrase: True, there is for thee by day prolonged occupation with ordinary duties:
translation: إِنَّ لَكَ فِي النَّهَارِ سَبْحًا طَوِيلًا

phrase: But keep in remembrance the name of thy Lord and devote thyself to Him whole-heartedly.
translation: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا

phrase: (He is) Lord of the East and the West: there is no god but He: take Him therefore for (thy) Disposer of Affairs.
translation: رَبُّ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَاتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا

phrase: And have patience with what they say, and leave them with noble (dignity).
translation: وَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَاهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًا جَمِيلًا

phrase: And leave Me (alone to deal with) those in possession of the good things of life, who (yet) deny the Truth; and bear with them for a little while.
translation: وَذَرْنِي وَالْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُولِي النَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا

phrase: With Us are Fetters (to bind them), and a Fire (to burn them),
translation: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَا أَنْكَالًا وَجَحِيمًا

phrase: And a Food that chokes, and a Penalty Grievous.
translation: وَطَعَامًا ذَا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

phrase: One Day the earth and the mountains will be in violent commotion. And the mountains will be as a heap of sand poured out and flowing down.
translation: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الْأَرْضُ وَالْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ الْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًا مَهِيلًا

phrase: We have sent to you, (O men!) a messenger, to be a witness concerning you, even as We sent a messenger to Pharaoh.
translation: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَاهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا

phrase: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger; so We seized him with a heavy Punishment.
translation: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ الرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَاهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا

phrase: Then how shall ye, if ye deny (Allah), guard yourselves against a Day that will make children hoary-headed?-
translation: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِنْ كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًا يَجْعَلُ الْوِلْدَانَ شِيبًا

phrase: Whereon the sky will be cleft asunder? His Promise needs must be accomplished.
translation: السَّمَاءُ مُنْفَطِرٌ بِهِ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُ مَفْعُولًا

phrase: Verily this is an Admonition: therefore, whoso will, let him take a (straight) path to his Lord!
translation: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَنْ شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا

phrase: Thy Lord doth know that thou standest forth (to prayer) nigh two-thirds of the night, or half the night, or a third of the night, and so doth a party of those with thee. But Allah doth appoint night and day in due measure He knoweth that ye are unable to keep count thereof. So He hath turned to you (in mercy): read ye, therefore, of the Qur´an as much as may be easy for you. He knoweth that there may be (some) among you in ill-health; others travelling through the land, seeking of Allah´s bounty; yet others fighting in Allah´s Cause, read ye, therefore, as much of the Qur´an as may be easy (for you); and establish regular Prayer and give regular Charity; and loan to Allah a Beautiful Loan. And whatever good ye send forth for your souls ye shall find it in Allah´s Presence,- yea, better and greater, in Reward and seek ye the Grace of Allah: for Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
translation: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِنْ ثُلُثَيِ اللَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُ وَثُلُثَهُ وَطَائِفَةٌ مِنَ الَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ اللَّيْلَ وَالنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَنْ لَنْ تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَنْ سَيَكُونُ مِنْكُمْ مَرْضَىٰ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِي الْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِنْ فَضْلِ اللَّهِ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يُقَاتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا لِأَنْفُسِكُمْ مِنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًا ۚ وَاسْتَغْفِرُوا اللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ

phrase: O thou wrapped up (in the mantle)!
translation: يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُدَّثِّرُ

phrase: Arise and deliver thy warning!
translation: قُمْ فَأَنْذِرْ

phrase: And thy Lord do thou magnify!
translation: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ

phrase: And thy garments keep free from stain!
translation: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ

phrase: And all abomination shun!
translation: وَالرُّجْزَ فَاهْجُرْ

phrase: Nor expect, in giving, any increase (for thyself)!
translation: وَلَا تَمْنُنْ تَسْتَكْثِرُ

phrase: But, for thy Lord´s (Cause), be patient and constant!
translation: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَاصْبِرْ

phrase: Finally, when the Trumpet is sounded,
translation: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِي النَّاقُورِ

phrase: That will be- that Day - a Day of Distress,-
translation: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ

phrase: Far from easy for those without Faith.
translation: عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍ

phrase: Leave Me alone, (to deal) with the (creature) whom I created (bare and) alone!-
translation: ذَرْنِي وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًا

phrase: To whom I granted resources in abundance,
translation: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُ مَالًا مَمْدُودًا

phrase: And sons to be by his side!-
translation: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًا

phrase: To whom I made (life) smooth and comfortable!
translation: وَمَهَّدْتُ لَهُ تَمْهِيدًا

phrase: Yet is he greedy-that I should add (yet more);-
translation: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ

phrase: By no means! For to Our Signs he has been refractory!
translation: كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّهُ كَانَ لِآيَاتِنَا عَنِيدًا

phrase: Soon will I visit him with a mount of calamities!
translation: سَأُرْهِقُهُ صَعُودًا

phrase: For he thought and he plotted;-
translation: إِنَّهُ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ

phrase: And woe to him! How he plotted!-
translation: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ

phrase: Yea, Woe to him; How he plotted!-
translation: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ

phrase: Then he looked round;
translation: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ

phrase: Then he frowned and he scowled;
translation: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ

phrase: Then he turned back and was haughty;
translation: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَاسْتَكْبَرَ

phrase: Then said he: "This is nothing but magic, derived from of old;
translation: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ

phrase: "This is nothing but the word of a mortal!"
translation: إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا قَوْلُ الْبَشَرِ

phrase: Soon will I cast him into Hell-Fire!
translation: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ

phrase: And what will explain to thee what Hell-Fire is?
translation: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سَقَرُ

phrase: Naught doth it permit to endure, and naught doth it leave alone!-
translation: لَا تُبْقِي وَلَا تَذَرُ

phrase: Darkening and changing the colour of man!
translation: لَوَّاحَةٌ لِلْبَشَرِ

phrase: Over it are Nineteen.
translation: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ

phrase: And We have set none but angels as Guardians of the Fire; and We have fixed their number only as a trial for Unbelievers,- in order that the People of the Book may arrive at certainty, and the Believers may increase in Faith,- and that no doubts may be left for the People of the Book and the Believers, and that those in whose hearts is a disease and the Unbelievers may say, "What symbol doth Allah intend by this?" Thus doth Allah leave to stray whom He pleaseth, and guide whom He pleaseth: and none can know the forces of thy Lord, except He and this is no other than a warning to mankind.
translation: وَمَا جَعَلْنَا أَصْحَابَ النَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَائِكَةً ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَيَزْدَادَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِيمَانًا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ مَرَضٌ وَالْكَافِرُونَ مَاذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِهَٰذَا مَثَلًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ اللَّهُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ وَيَهْدِي مَنْ يَشَاءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِيَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ

phrase: Nay, verily: By the Moon,
translation: كَلَّا وَالْقَمَرِ

phrase: And by the Night as it retreateth,
translation: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ

phrase: And by the Dawn as it shineth forth,-
translation: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا أَسْفَرَ

phrase: This is but one of the mighty (portents),
translation: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى الْكُبَرِ

phrase: A warning to mankind,-
translation: نَذِيرًا لِلْبَشَرِ

phrase: To any of you that chooses to press forward, or to follow behind;-
translation: لِمَنْ شَاءَ مِنْكُمْ أَنْ يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ

phrase: Every soul will be (held) in pledge for its deeds.
translation: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ

phrase: Except the Companions of the Right Hand.
translation: إِلَّا أَصْحَابَ الْيَمِينِ

phrase: (They will be) in Gardens (of Delight): they will question each other,
translation: فِي جَنَّاتٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ

phrase: And (ask) of the Sinners:
translation: عَنِ الْمُجْرِمِينَ

phrase: "What led you into Hell Fire?"
translation: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِي سَقَرَ

phrase: They will say: "We were not of those who prayed;
translation: قَالُوا لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ الْمُصَلِّينَ

phrase: "Nor were we of those who fed the indigent;
translation: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ الْمِسْكِينَ

phrase: "But we used to talk vanities with vain talkers;
translation: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ الْخَائِضِينَ

phrase: "And we used to deny the Day of Judgment,
translation: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ

phrase: "Until there came to us (the Hour) that is certain."
translation: حَتَّىٰ أَتَانَا الْيَقِينُ

phrase: Then will no intercession of (any) intercessors profit them.
translation: فَمَا تَنْفَعُهُمْ شَفَاعَةُ الشَّافِعِينَ

phrase: Then what is the matter with them that they turn away from admonition?-
translation: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ التَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ

phrase: As if they were affrighted asses,
translation: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌ مُسْتَنْفِرَةٌ

phrase: Fleeing from a lion!
translation: فَرَّتْ مِنْ قَسْوَرَةٍ

phrase: Forsooth, each one of them wants to be given scrolls (of revelation) spread out!
translation: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِنْهُمْ أَنْ يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُنَشَّرَةً

phrase: By no means! But they fear not the Hereafter,
translation: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ لَا يَخَافُونَ الْآخِرَةَ

phrase: Nay, this surely is an admonition:
translation: كَلَّا إِنَّهُ تَذْكِرَةٌ

phrase: But none will keep it in remembrance except as Allah wills: He is the Lord of Righteousness, and the Lord of Forgiveness.
translation: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّا أَنْ يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ التَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ

phrase: I do call to witness the Resurrection Day;
translation: لَا أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ

phrase: And I do call to witness the self-reproaching spirit: (Eschew Evil).
translation: وَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالنَّفْسِ اللَّوَّامَةِ

phrase: Does man think that We cannot assemble his bones?
translation: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنْسَانُ أَلَّنْ نَجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُ

phrase: Nay, We are able to put together in perfect order the very tips of his fingers.
translation: بَلَىٰ قَادِرِينَ عَلَىٰ أَنْ نُسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُ

phrase: But man wishes to do wrong (even) in the time in front of him.
translation: بَلْ يُرِيدُ الْإِنْسَانُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُ

phrase: He questions: "When is the Day of Resurrection?"
translation: يَسْأَلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الْقِيَامَةِ

phrase: At length, when the sight is dazed,
translation: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ الْبَصَرُ

phrase: And the moon is buried in darkness.
translation: وَخَسَفَ الْقَمَرُ

phrase: And the sun and moon are joined together,-
translation: وَجُمِعَ الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ

phrase: That Day will Man say: "Where is the refuge?"
translation: يَقُولُ الْإِنْسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ الْمَفَرُّ

phrase: By no means! No place of safety!
translation: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ

phrase: Before thy Lord (alone), that Day will be the place of rest.
translation: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمُسْتَقَرُّ

phrase: That Day will Man be told (all) that he put forward, and all that he put back.
translation: يُنَبَّأُ الْإِنْسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ

phrase: Nay, man will be evidence against himself,
translation: بَلِ الْإِنْسَانُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ بَصِيرَةٌ

phrase: Even though he were to put up his excuses.
translation: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُ

phrase: Move not thy tongue concerning the (Qur´an) to make haste therewith.
translation: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِ

phrase: It is for Us to collect it and to promulgate it:
translation: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُ وَقُرْآنَهُ

phrase: But when We have promulgated it, follow thou its recital (as promulgated):
translation: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَاهُ فَاتَّبِعْ قُرْآنَهُ

phrase: Nay more, it is for Us to explain it (and make it clear):
translation: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُ

phrase: Nay, (ye men!) but ye love the fleeting life,
translation: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ

phrase: And leave alone the Hereafter.
translation: وَتَذَرُونَ الْآخِرَةَ

phrase: Some faces, that Day, will beam (in brightness and beauty);-
translation: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَاضِرَةٌ

phrase: Looking towards their Lord;
translation: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌ

phrase: And some faces, that Day, will be sad and dismal,
translation: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ بَاسِرَةٌ

phrase: In the thought that some back-breaking calamity was about to be inflicted on them;
translation: تَظُنُّ أَنْ يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌ

phrase: Yea, when (the soul) reaches to the collar-bone (in its exit),
translation: كَلَّا إِذَا بَلَغَتِ التَّرَاقِيَ

phrase: And there will be a cry, "Who is a magician (to restore him)?"
translation: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍ

phrase: And he will conclude that it was (the Time) of Parting;
translation: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ الْفِرَاقُ

phrase: And one leg will be joined with another:
translation: وَالْتَفَّتِ السَّاقُ بِالسَّاقِ

phrase: That Day the Drive will be (all) to thy Lord!
translation: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمَسَاقُ

phrase: So he gave nothing in charity, nor did he pray!-
translation: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ

phrase: But on the contrary, he rejected Truth and turned away!
translation: وَلَٰكِنْ كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

phrase: Then did he stalk to his family in full conceit!
translation: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ يَتَمَطَّىٰ

phrase: Woe to thee, (O men!), yea, woe!
translation: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ

phrase: Again, Woe to thee, (O men!), yea, woe!
translation: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ

phrase: Does man think that he will be left uncontrolled, (without purpose)?
translation: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنْسَانُ أَنْ يُتْرَكَ سُدًى

phrase: Was he not a drop of sperm emitted (in lowly form)?
translation: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِنْ مَنِيٍّ يُمْنَىٰ

phrase: Then did he become a leech-like clot; then did (Allah) make and fashion (him) in due proportion.
translation: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ

phrase: And of him He made two sexes, male and female.
translation: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنْثَىٰ

phrase: Has not He, (the same), the power to give life to the dead?
translation: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَنْ يُحْيِيَ الْمَوْتَىٰ

phrase: Has there not been over Man a long period of Time, when he was nothing - (not even) mentioned?
translation: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى الْإِنْسَانِ حِينٌ مِنَ الدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُنْ شَيْئًا مَذْكُورًا

phrase: Verily We created Man from a drop of mingled sperm, in order to try him: So We gave him (the gifts), of Hearing and Sight.
translation: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسَانَ مِنْ نُطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَاهُ سَمِيعًا بَصِيرًا

phrase: We showed him the Way: whether he be grateful or ungrateful (rests on his will).
translation: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَاهُ السَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

phrase: For the Rejecters we have prepared chains, yokes, and a blazing Fire.
translation: إِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَافِرِينَ سَلَاسِلَ وَأَغْلَالًا وَسَعِيرًا

phrase: As to the Righteous, they shall drink of a Cup (of Wine) mixed with Kafur,-
translation: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِنْ كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا

phrase: A Fountain where the Devotees of Allah do drink, making it flow in unstinted abundance.
translation: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ اللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا

phrase: They perform (their) vows, and they fear a Day whose evil flies far and wide.
translation: يُوفُونَ بِالنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُ مُسْتَطِيرًا

phrase: And they feed, for the love of Allah, the indigent, the orphan, and the captive,-
translation: وَيُطْعِمُونَ الطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا

phrase: (Saying),"We feed you for the sake of Allah alone: no reward do we desire from you, nor thanks.
translation: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ اللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنْكُمْ جَزَاءً وَلَا شُكُورًا

phrase: "We only fear a Day of distressful Wrath from the side of our Lord."
translation: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِنْ رَبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا

phrase: But Allah will deliver them from the evil of that Day, and will shed over them a Light of Beauty and (blissful) Joy.
translation: فَوَقَاهُمُ اللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّاهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا

phrase: And because they were patient and constant, He will reward them with a Garden and (garments of) silk.
translation: وَجَزَاهُمْ بِمَا صَبَرُوا جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا

phrase: Reclining in the (Garden) on raised thrones, they will see there neither the sun´s (excessive heat) nor (the moon´s) excessive cold.
translation: مُتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا

phrase: And the shades of the (Garden) will come low over them, and the bunches (of fruit), there, will hang low in humility.
translation: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَالُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا

phrase: And amongst them will be passed round vessels of silver and goblets of crystal,-
translation: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِمْ بِآنِيَةٍ مِنْ فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا

phrase: Crystal-clear, made of silver: they will determine the measure thereof (according to their wishes).
translation: قَوَارِيرَ مِنْ فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا

phrase: And they will be given to drink there of a Cup (of Wine) mixed with Zanjabil,-
translation: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنْجَبِيلًا

phrase: A fountain there, called Salsabil.
translation: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا

phrase: And round about them will (serve) youths of perpetual (freshness): If thou seest them, thou wouldst think them scattered Pearls.
translation: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَانٌ مُخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَنْثُورًا

phrase: And when thou lookest, it is there thou wilt see a Bliss and a Realm Magnificent.
translation: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا

phrase: Upon them will be green Garments of fine silk and heavy brocade, and they will be adorned with Bracelets of silver; and their Lord will give to them to drink of a Wine Pure and Holy.
translation: عَالِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُنْدُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوا أَسَاوِرَ مِنْ فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا

phrase: "Verily this is a Reward for you, and your Endeavour is accepted and recognised."
translation: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَاءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُمْ مَشْكُورًا

phrase: It is We Who have sent down the Qur´an to thee by stages.
translation: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ الْقُرْآنَ تَنْزِيلًا

phrase: Therefore be patient with constancy to the Command of thy Lord, and hearken not to the sinner or the ingrate among them.
translation: فَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ آثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا

phrase: And celebrate the name of thy Lord morning and evening,
translation: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا

phrase: And part of the night, prostrate thyself to Him; and glorify Him a long night through.
translation: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَاسْجُدْ لَهُ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا

phrase: As to these, they love the fleeting life, and put away behind them a Day (that will be) hard.
translation: إِنَّ هَٰؤُلَاءِ يُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَاءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا

phrase: It is We Who created them, and We have made their joints strong; but, when We will, We can substitute the like of them by a complete change.
translation: نَحْنُ خَلَقْنَاهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَا أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَا أَمْثَالَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا

phrase: But ye will not, except as Allah wills; for Allah is full of Knowledge and Wisdom.
translation: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَنْ يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا

phrase: He will admit to His Mercy whom He will; But the wrong-doers,- for them has He prepared a grievous Penalty.
translation: يُدْخِلُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ ۚ وَالظَّالِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

phrase: By the (Winds) sent forth one after another (to man´s profit);
translation: وَالْمُرْسَلَاتِ عُرْفًا

phrase: Which then blow violently in tempestuous Gusts,
translation: فَالْعَاصِفَاتِ عَصْفًا

phrase: And scatter (things) far and wide;
translation: وَالنَّاشِرَاتِ نَشْرًا

phrase: Then separate them, one from another,
translation: فَالْفَارِقَاتِ فَرْقًا

phrase: Then spread abroad a Message,
translation: فَالْمُلْقِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا

phrase: Whether of Justification or of Warning;-
translation: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا

phrase: Assuredly, what ye are promised must come to pass.
translation: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَاقِعٌ

phrase: Then when the stars become dim;
translation: فَإِذَا النُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ

phrase: When the heaven is cleft asunder;
translation: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ فُرِجَتْ

phrase: When the mountains are scattered (to the winds) as dust;
translation: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ

phrase: And when the messengers are (all) appointed a time (to collect);-
translation: وَإِذَا الرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ

phrase: For what Day are these (portents) deferred?
translation: لِأَيِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ

phrase: For the Day of Sorting out.
translation: لِيَوْمِ الْفَصْلِ

phrase: And what will explain to thee what is the Day of Sorting out?
translation: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ

phrase: Did We not destroy the men of old (for their evil)?
translation: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ الْأَوَّلِينَ

phrase: So shall We make later (generations) follow them.
translation: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ الْآخِرِينَ

phrase: Thus do We deal with men of sin.
translation: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ

phrase: Have We not created you from a fluid (held) despicable?-
translation: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقْكُمْ مِنْ مَاءٍ مَهِينٍ

phrase: The which We placed in a place of rest, firmly fixed,
translation: فَجَعَلْنَاهُ فِي قَرَارٍ مَكِينٍ

phrase: For a period (of gestation), determined (according to need)?
translation: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍ مَعْلُومٍ

phrase: For We do determine (according to need); for We are the best to determine (things).
translation: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ الْقَادِرُونَ

phrase: Have We not made the earth (as a place) to draw together.
translation: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا

phrase: The living and the dead,
translation: أَحْيَاءً وَأَمْوَاتًا

phrase: And made therein mountains standing firm, lofty (in stature); and provided for you water sweet (and wholesome)?
translation: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ شَامِخَاتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَاكُمْ مَاءً فُرَاتًا

phrase: (It will be said:) "Depart ye to that which ye used to reject as false!
translation: انْطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ مَا كُنْتُمْ بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ

phrase: "Depart ye to a Shadow (of smoke ascending) in three columns,
translation: انْطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِي ثَلَاثِ شُعَبٍ

phrase: "(Which yields) no shade of coolness, and is of no use against the fierce Blaze.
translation: لَا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِنَ اللَّهَبِ

phrase: "Indeed it throws about sparks (huge) as Forts,
translation: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِي بِشَرَرٍ كَالْقَصْرِ

phrase: "As if there were (a string of) yellow camels (marching swiftly)."
translation: كَأَنَّهُ جِمَالَتٌ صُفْرٌ

phrase: That will be a Day when they shall not be able to speak.
translation: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنْطِقُونَ

phrase: Nor will it be open to them to put forth pleas.
translation: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ

phrase: That will be a Day of Sorting out! We shall gather you together and those before (you)!
translation: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَاكُمْ وَالْأَوَّلِينَ

phrase: Now, if ye have a trick (or plot), use it against Me!
translation: فَإِنْ كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ

phrase: As to the Righteous, they shall be amidst (cool) shades and springs (of water).
translation: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي ظِلَالٍ وَعُيُونٍ

phrase: And (they shall have) fruits,- all they desire.
translation: وَفَوَاكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ

phrase: (O ye unjust!) Eat ye and enjoy yourselves (but) a little while, for that ye are Sinners.
translation: كُلُوا وَتَمَتَّعُوا قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُمْ مُجْرِمُونَ

phrase: And when it is said to them, "Prostrate yourselves!" they do not so.
translation: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ارْكَعُوا لَا يَرْكَعُونَ

phrase: Then what Message, after that, will they believe in?
translation: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثٍ بَعْدَهُ يُؤْمِنُونَ
